pages.text: Wa Al-Ladhi 'Awhayna 'Ilayka Mina Al-Kitabi Huwa Al-Haqqu Musaddiqaan Lima Bayna Yadayhi 'Inna Allaha Bi`ibadihi Lakhabirun Basirun
Thumma 'Awrathna Al-Kitaba Al-Ladhina Astafayna Min `Ibadina Faminhum Zalimun Linafsihi Wa Minhum Muqtasidun Wa Minhum Sabiqun Bil-Khayrati Bi'idhni Allahi Dhalika Huwa Al-Falu Al-Kabiru
Jannatu `Adnin Yadkhulunaha Yuhallawna Fiha Min 'Asawira Min Dhahabin Wa Lu'ulu'uaan Wa Libasuhum Fiha Harirun
Wa Qalu Al-Hamdu Lillahi Al-Ladhi 'Adh/haba `Anna Al-Hazana 'Inna Rabbana Laghafurun Shakurun
Al-Ladhi 'Ahallana Dara Al-Muqamati Min Falihi La Yamassuna Fiha Nasabun Wa La Yamassuna Fiha Lughubun
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Lahum Naru Jahannama La Yuqa `Alayhim Fayamutu Wa La Yukhaffafu `Anhum Min `Adhabiha Kadhalika Najzi Kulla Kafurin

Wa Hum Yastarikhuna Fiha Rabbana 'Akhrijna Na`mal Salihaan Ghayra Al-Ladhi Kunna Na`malu 'Awalam Nu`ammirkum Ma Yatadhakkaru Fihi Man Tadhakkara Wa Ja'akumu An-Nadhiru Fadhuqu Fama Lilzzalimina Min Nasir
Inna Allaha `Alimu Ghaybi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ari 'Innahu `Alimun Bidhati As-Suduri
